introduction.title: About us
introduction.description: On behalf and under the supervision of the steering body «Ressources dedicated to the NGDI» - composed of representatives from KOGIS and KGK - the thematic leaderships below organize, under the coordination and direction of the secretariat, the «establishment of a new organization in the field of geoinformation standards and INTERLIS governance». Currently, a strategy is being developed and aligned with stakeholders (Federal government, cantons, SOGI, eCH, etc.). The work is funded by the ressources dedicated to the NGDI.

strategy.title: Strategy
strategy.description: Version 1.0 of the GeoStandards.ch strategy was approved on 07.06.2021. It comprises 2 pages and defines 8 basic strategic principles for GeoStandards.ch.

organization.title: Organisation
organization.description: Version 1.0 of the GeoStandards.ch organisational concept was approved on 08.07.2021. It comprises 33 pages and contains an introduction, a situation analysis, a desired state and a transition concept.
